# [Interview #1168: BYU Bookstore, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1168#3)

#### Question

not specified

#### Brandon Sanderson

There is a Shard on Threnody called Ambition.

#### Footnote

Other sources indicate this is past tense.
